```{r}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(ggh4x)
library(patchwork)
library(reactable)

tbsegshed <- tbeptools::tbsegshed

source(here('R/funcs.R'))

levs <- c('Old Tampa Bay', 'Hillsborough Bay', 'Middle Tampa Bay', 
                  'Lower Tampa Bay', 'Remainder Lower Tampa Bay')

totanndat <- rdataload('https://github.com/tbep-tech/load-estimates/raw/refs/heads/main/data/totanndat.RData') |> 
  select(year, bay_segment, tn_load, tnhy, hy_load) |> 
  dplyr::filter(bay_segment != 'All Segments (- N. BCB)')

tnanndat <- rdataload('https://github.com/tbep-tech/load-estimates/raw/refs/heads/main/data/tnanndat.RData') |> 
  dplyr::filter(bay_segment != 'All Segments (- N. BCB)')

tnanndat2224 <- read.csv(here('data/SrcSegAnnLoad2224.csv')) |> 
  filter(!BAY_SEG == 5) |>
  mutate(
    bay_segment = case_when(
      BAY_SEG == 1 ~ 'Old Tampa Bay',
      BAY_SEG == 2 ~ 'Hillsborough Bay',
      BAY_SEG == 3 ~ 'Middle Tampa Bay',
      BAY_SEG == 4 ~ 'Lower Tampa Bay',
      BAY_SEG %in% c(55, 6, 7) ~ 'Remainder Lower Tampa Bay'
    )
  ) |> 
  select(
    year = YEAR,
    bay_segment,
    source,
    tn_load = TN_TONS
  ) |>
  summarise(
    tn_load = sum(tn_load),
    .by = c(bay_segment, year, source)
  )

tnanndat <- bind_rows(tnanndat, tnanndat2224) |> 
  mutate(
    source = case_when(
      source %in% c('GW', 'SPR') ~ 'GWS', 
      source == 'ML' ~ 'IPS', 
      T ~ source
    )
  ) |> 
  summarize(
    tn_load = sum(tn_load),
    .by = c(bay_segment, year, source)
  )

# includes ps
npsmonth <- read.csv(here('data/npsmod4_2224_26Sep25.csv')) |> 
  filter(!BAY_SEG == 5) |>
  mutate(
    bay_segment = case_when(
      BAY_SEG == 1 ~ 'Old Tampa Bay',
      BAY_SEG == 2 ~ 'Hillsborough Bay',
      BAY_SEG == 3 ~ 'Middle Tampa Bay',
      BAY_SEG == 4 ~ 'Lower Tampa Bay',
      BAY_SEG %in% c(55, 6, 7) ~ 'Remainder Lower Tampa Bay'
    ),
    date = lubridate::make_date(year, month, '01'), 
    tn_load = tnload / 907.2, # kg to tons
    hy_load = h2oload / 1e6, # m3 to 1e6 m3
    bay_segment = factor(bay_segment, levels = levs)
  ) |> 
  select(
    date,
    bay_segment,
    tn_load,
    hy_load
  ) |>
  summarise(
    tn_load = sum(tn_load),
    hy_load = sum(hy_load),
    .by = c(bay_segment, date)
  )

# monthly hydro loads
mohydat <- rdataload('https://github.com/tbep-tech/load-estimates/raw/refs/heads/main/data/mohydat.RData') |> 
  dplyr::filter(bay_segment != 'All Segments (- N. BCB)') |> 
  rename(
    hy_load = hy_load_106_m3_mo
  )
```

## RA FRAMEWORK

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
-   Each year, assess attainment of water quality thresholds
-   Loadings only evaluated if water quality thresholds not attained in two consecutive years
-   Annual reporting to FDEP, fourth year of [2022 -- 2026 RA period](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18HHMx4U6vHNrFyepEFuoTJ_sEKyTA_gu/view)

:::

:::

## EPA TMDL  

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
Based on 1992 -- 1994 mean loads:

* OTB: 486 tons / yr
* HB: 1451 tons / yr
* MTB: 799 tons / yr
* LTB: 349 tons / yr
* RALTB: 629 tons / yr
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
```{r}
#| out-width: 100%
tn_thresh <- tibble(
  bay_segment = c('Old Tampa Bay', 'Hillsborough Bay', 'Middle Tampa Bay', 
                  'Lower Tampa Bay', 'Boca Ciega Bay', 'Terra Ceia Bay', 'Manatee River'),
  tn_thresh = c(486, 1451, 799, 349, 629, 629, 629)
)

tomap <- tbsegshed |> 
  left_join(tn_thresh, by = c("long_name" = "bay_segment"))

pal <- colorNumeric(palette = "YlGnBu", domain = tomap$tn_thresh)

cent <- st_centroid(tbsegshed)

leaflet(tomap) %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  addPolygons(
    fillColor = ~pal(tn_thresh),
    weight = 0.5,
    opacity = 1,
    color = "black",
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
  ) %>%
  addLabelOnlyMarkers(
    data = cent,
    label = ~long_name,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE, direction = 'center', textOnly = TRUE,
      style = list(
        "background-color" = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6)", # Set background to white
        "padding" = "1px", # Add some padding around the text
        "font-size" = "12px" # Adjust font size
      ))
  ) %>%
  addLegend(
    pal = pal,
    values = ~tn_thresh,
    title = "Load",
    position = "bottomright"
  )
```

## 2022 -- 2024 LOADING ESTIMATES

::: {.incremental}
* Calculated with 2023 land use data, current precipitation/atmospheric data, partner-provided data
* Described as total loads broken down by source categories:
  -   Atmospheric deposition
  -   Domestic point sources: end-of-pipe, reuse
  -   Industrial point sources (including material losses)
  -   Nonpoint sources
  -   Groundwater/Springs
* Entity allocations for domestic, industrial, and nonpoint sources, by bay segment
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## TOTAL LOADS BY SEGMENT

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6
lns <- tibble(
  bay_segment = factor(levs, levels = levs),
  tn_thresh = c(486, 1451, 799, 349, 629)
)

toplo <- totanndat |> 
  mutate(
    bay_segment = factor(bay_segment, levels = levs)
  ) |> 
  left_join(lns, by = "bay_segment") |> 
  mutate(
    exceeds = tn_load > tn_thresh, 
    tn_load_5yravg = zoo::rollmean(tn_load, k = 5, fill = NA, align = 'right'),
    exceeds_5yravg = tn_load_5yravg > tn_thresh,
    .by = bay_segment
  )

ggplot(toplo, aes(x = year, y = tn_load, group = bay_segment)) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = tn_thresh), linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +
  geom_line(alpha = 0) +
  geom_point(size = 3, shape = 21, show.legend = F, alpha = 0) +  
  geom_line(data = toplo |> filter(year < 2022)) +
  geom_point(data = toplo |> filter(year < 2022), aes(fill = exceeds), size = 3, shape = 21, show.legend = F) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("TRUE" = "#ffcccc", "FALSE" = "#ccffcc"), 
                    labels = c("FALSE" = "Meets Threshold", "TRUE" = "Exceeds Threshold")) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(1985, 2024)) +
  facet_wrap(~ bay_segment, scales = "free_y",  ncol = 1) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "Total Nitrogen Load (tons/yr)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank()
  )
```

## PROPORTIONAL 2022 -- 2024

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-align: "center"
toplo2 <- toplo |> 
  filter(year >= 2022) |> 
  mutate(
    source = factor(source, levels = c('AD', 'DPS', 'IPS', 'GWS', 'NPS'))
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    tot = sum(tn_load),
    .by = c(bay_segment, year)
  )

for(lev in seq_along(levs)){

  tmp <- toplo2 |> 
    filter(bay_segment == levs[lev]) |> 
    complete(source, year, fill = list(tn_load = 0))

  p <- ggplot(tmp, aes(x = tot / 2, y = tn_load, fill = source, width = tot)) +
    geom_bar(position = 'fill', stat = 'identity', color = 'grey') + 
    coord_polar('y', start = 0) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = cols, drop = F, ) +
    facet_wrap(~ year) +
    labs(
      x = NULL,
      fill = "Source",
      y = NULL, 
      title = levs[lev]
    ) +
    theme_void() + 
    theme(
      plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 12), 
      strip.text = element_text(size = 10),
      plot.margin = unit(c(0, 0, 0, 0), 'pt')
    )

  assign(paste0('p', lev), p)

}

p1 + p2 + p3 + p4 + p5 + plot_layout(ncol = 2, guides = 'collect') +  
  plot_annotation(
    caption = "Radius proportional within bay segments"
  ) &
  theme(legend.position = 'right') 
```

## HYDROLOGIC LOADS JUN -- SEP

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6
toplo <- mohydat |> 
  filter(month %in% 6:9) |> 
  summarise(
    hy_load = sum(hy_load),
    .by = c(bay_segment, year)
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    raperiod = case_when(
      year < 2002 ~ 'Pre-RA',
      year %in% c(2002:2006) ~ '2002 - 2006',
      year %in% c(2007:2011) ~ '2007 - 2011',
      year %in% c(2012:2016) ~ '2012 - 2016',
      year %in% c(2017:2021) ~ '2017 - 2021',
      year >= 2022 ~ '2022 - 2027'
    ), 
    raperiod = factor(raperiod, levels = c('Pre-RA', '2002 - 2006', '2007 - 2011', 
                                         '2012 - 2016', '2017 - 2021', '2022 - 2027')),
    bay_segment = factor(bay_segment, levels = levs)                                          
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    hy_load_ave = mean(hy_load),
    .by = c(bay_segment, raperiod)
  )
ggplot(toplo, aes(x = year, y = hy_load, group = raperiod, fill = raperiod)) +
  geom_rect(xmin = 2022, xmax = 2024, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf, fill = 'grey', alpha = 0.6) + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_point(size = 3, shape = 21) +
  geom_line(aes(y = hy_load_ave, color = raperiod)) +
  # scale_fill_manual(values = c("TRUE" = "cadetblue", "FALSE" = "cadetblue1"), 
                    # labels = c("FALSE" = "Meets Threshold", "TRUE" = "Exceeds Threshold")) +
  facet_wrap(~ bay_segment, scales = "free_y",  ncol = 1) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "Rainy Season Total Hydrologic Load (1e6 m3/yr)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(), 
    legend.position = 'bottom'
  ) + 
  labs(
    fill = "RA Period",
    color = "RA Period"
  ) + 
  guides(fill = guide_legend(nrow = 1), color = guide_legend(nrow = 1))
```

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(toplo, aes(x = date, y = tn_load)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point(size = 2, shape = 21, aes(fill = factor(year))) +
  scale_x_date(date_labels = "%b", breaks = scales::breaks_pretty(12)) +
  facet_wrap(~ bay_segment, ncol = 1) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "NPS TN Load (tons/month)",
    fill = "Year"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), 
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7),
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), 
    legend.position = 'right'
  )

p2 <- ggplot(toplo, aes(x = date, y = hy_load)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point(size = 2, shape = 21, aes(fill = factor(year))) +
  scale_x_date(date_labels = "%b", breaks = scales::breaks_pretty(12)) +
  facet_wrap(~ bay_segment, ncol = 1) +
  labs(
    x = NULL,
    y = "NPS Hydro Load (1e6 m3/month)",
    fill = "Year"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), 
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7),
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank()
  )

p1 + p2 + plot_layout(ncol = 2, guides = 'collect') &
  theme(legend.position = 'right')
```

```{r}
  left_join(lns, by = "bay_segment") |>
```

## CONCLUSIONS

::: {.incremental}
* Chlorophyll-a thresholds attained for first three years of 2022 -- 2026 RA period
* No need to evaluate loadings -- but, absolute load exceeded for OTB and RALTB in 2022, all segments except LTB in 2024
* High loadings in 2024 from tropical storm activity, NPS contributions
* Nitrogen delivery ratio not exceeded in any segment for 2022 -- 2024
:::
